original: @10b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @10b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: @11a * // sapta aa ksha ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: @11a * // sapta aa ksha ra s'a dha nam /
translated: Saptaaksarasadhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The sādhana of the seven syllables

original: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajraḍāka.

original: byis pa bung med phal cher ni //
analyzed: byis pa bung med phal cher ni //
translated: Most childish beings are without bees,

original: rgyas par gzung dkar 'gyur bas na //
analyzed: rgyas par gzung dkar 'gyur bas na //
translated: and so they become difficult to hold.

original: mdor bsdus pa'i yang mdor bsdus nas //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa'i yang mdor bsdus nas //
translated: Having summarized the very concise,

original: yi ge bdun pa bsdu bar bya ;
analyzed: yi ge bdun pa bsdu bar bya ;
translated: the seven syllables are to be summarized.

original: / mchod sogs stong nyid byang chub kyi //
analyzed: / mchod sogs stong nyid byang chub kyi //
translated: Worship and so forth are the culmination of emptiness and awakening,

original: sngags kyi mthar thug 'og tu ni //
analyzed: sngags kyi mthar thug 'og tu ni //
translated: at the end of the mantra below.

original: brtser lhan lus kyi dbus son pa'i //
analyzed: brtser lhan lus kyi dbus son pa'i //
translated: In the center of the body, which is the abode of compassion,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub bya //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub bya //
translated: Vajraḍāka is to be accomplished.

original: yam ram bam lam 'byung pa bzhi'i //
analyzed: yam ram bam lam 'byung pa bzhi'i //
translated: From yaṃ, raṃ, vaṃ, and laṃ, the four elements

original: dkyil 'khor steng du sum las byung //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor steng du sum las byung //
translated: arise on the maṇḍala above.🔽One should imagine Meru, the seven precious substances,

original: lhun po rin chen sna bdun dang // rtse mo brgyad pa bsam par bya ;🔽/ aom me di n'i badzr'i bha pa badzra bandha h'um /🔽aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um bam h'um /
analyzed: lhun po rin chen sna bdun dang // rtse mo brgyad pa bsam par bya ; / aom me di n'i badzr'i bha pa badzra bandha h'um / aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um bam h'um /
translated: and the eight peaks.🔽oṃ medinī vajra bhap vajra bandha hūṃ🔽oṃ vajra prakara hūṃ vaṃ hūṃ

original: aom badzra panydza ra h'um ram h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra panydza ra h'um ram h'um /
translated: oṃ vajra pañjara hūṃ raṃ hūṃ

original: aom badzra bi t'a na h'um kham h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra bi t'a na h'um kham h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-vitāna hūṃ khaṃ hūṃ.

original: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tr'am sam tr'am /
analyzed: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tr'am sam tr'am /
translated: Oṃ vajra-sarva-jvālā traṃ saṃtraṃ.

original: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um h'um h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um h'um h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-jvālānalā arka hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ.

original: rdo rje sa sogs drug byas nas //
analyzed: rdo rje sa sogs drug byas nas //
translated: Having made the six vajras of earth, etc.,

original: 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rjer gnas //
analyzed: 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rjer gnas //
translated: one should draw a multicolored vajra in the center of a multicolored vajra circle.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ;
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ;
translated: It is surrounded by a garland of multicolored vajras.

original: / rtsibs drug la ni bri bar bya //🔽'dir ni h'um las byung pha yi //
analyzed: / rtsibs drug la ni bri bar bya // 'dir ni h'um las byung pha yi //
translated: One should draw it on a six-spoked wheel.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde chen po //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde chen po //
translated: Here, one should visualize the great bliss Vajraḍāka,

original: phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa //
analyzed: phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa //
translated: arisen from hūṃ, with three faces, six arms, and three eyes,

original: mtshan kun gyis mtshan bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mtshan kun gyis mtshan bsgom par bya //
translated: marked with all the signs.

original: dpe byad brgyad cu yang dag ldan //
analyzed: dpe byad brgyad cu yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with the eighty minor marks,

original: khyab bdag a'a li k'a lis byung //
analyzed: khyab bdag a'a li k'a lis byung //
translated: arisen from Īśvara and Kāli,

original: rdo rje dril bus snyoms bar zhugs //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bus snyoms bar zhugs //
translated: united with the vajra and bell,

original: mi yi pags pa rlon pa 'chang //
analyzed: mi yi pags pa rlon pa 'chang //
translated: wearing a fresh human skin,🔽holding a skull and khaṭvāṅga in the left hands,

original: g-yon pa thong pa kha t'am ga / phyag g-yas na ni mdung rtse gsum //
analyzed: g-yon pa thong pa kha t'am ga / phyag g-yas na ni mdung rtse gsum //
translated: and a trident and a flaying knife in the right hands,

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang // ral pas sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang // ral pas sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang //
translated: with a crown of a garland of skulls, and with matted hair, holding a multicolored vajra.

original: zla ba phyed pa'i thod dang ni //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa'i thod dang ni //
translated: The skull of the half-moon,

original: phyag rgya drug gis sku la bklubs //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis sku la bklubs //
translated: and the body is covered with the six mudras.

original: mthing dang ser dang ljang gu'i zhal ;
analyzed: mthing dang ser dang ljang gu'i zhal ;
translated: Blue, yellow, and green faces,

original: / stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsol //
analyzed: / stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsol //
translated: wearing a tiger-skin skirt.

original: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan mo //
analyzed: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan mo //
translated: Bhairava and Kalarati,

original: g-yas brkyang ba yis nyi mar mnan //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba yis nyi mar mnan //
translated: pressing on the sun with the right leg extended.

original: mgon po ji lta de bzhin du //
analyzed: mgon po ji lta de bzhin du //
translated: Just like the Lord,

original: rdo rje phag mo'ang phyag la sogs //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'ang phyag la sogs //
translated: Vajravārāhī also has the same number of arms and so forth.

original: lha mo byin pa yang dag 'khyud //
analyzed: lha mo byin pa yang dag 'khyud //
translated: The goddess embraces him with her hips.

original: mchog tu dga' bas myos pa mo //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' bas myos pa mo //
translated: She is intoxicated by supreme joy.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: yi ge 'dis ;
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: yi ge 'dis ;
translated: With the syllables JAH HŪM VAṀ HOḤ,

original: / ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: / ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa //
translated: the wisdom beings are invoked and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor ma drug rtsibs drug la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma drug rtsibs drug la //
translated: The six yoginīs are on the six spokes,

original: g-yon du bskor bas rnam bskor bas //
analyzed: g-yon du bskor bas rnam bskor bas //
translated: circling to the left.

original: dad po lha mo khrag 'thung ma //
analyzed: dad po lha mo khrag 'thung ma //
translated: The first goddess is Raktayamāri,

original: gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma //
analyzed: gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma //
translated: the second is Vajrabhairava,

original: gsum pa drug gtum ma dang ni //
analyzed: gsum pa drug gtum ma dang ni //
translated: the third is Ṣaṇḍa Caṇḍālī,

original: bzhi pa rdo rje snang byed ma //
analyzed: bzhi pa rdo rje snang byed ma //
translated: the fourth is Vajranārāyaṇī,

original: lnga pa rdo rje drag mo ste //
analyzed: lnga pa rdo rje drag mo ste //
translated: the fifth is Vajravetālī,

original: @11b drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro yin //
analyzed: @11b drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro yin //
translated: and the sixth is Vajradākini.

original: sngon mo ser mo ljang gu dang // dmar mo dud ka de bzhin dkar //
analyzed: sngon mo ser mo ljang gu dang // dmar mo dud ka de bzhin dkar //
translated: red, smoke-colored, and white.

original: skra bshig ma la drag chen ma //
analyzed: skra bshig ma la drag chen ma //
translated: She has disheveled hair and is very fierce.

original: spyan gsum ma sta phyogs kyi gos //
analyzed: spyan gsum ma sta phyogs kyi gos //
translated: She has three eyes and is clad in a patchwork cloak.

original: phyag ni cig shos phyag gnyis ni //
analyzed: phyag ni cig shos phyag gnyis ni //
translated: One of her hands

original: sgra sgrogs da ma ru dril bus mtshan //
analyzed: sgra sgrogs da ma ru dril bus mtshan //
translated: is marked with a skull, a ḍamaru, and a bell.

original: mi yi pags pa bsnams pa ste ;
analyzed: mi yi pags pa bsnams pa ste ;
translated: She holds a human skin

original: / yi dags nyi ma'i steng na gnas //
analyzed: / yi dags nyi ma'i steng na gnas //
translated: and stands on a corpse on the sun.

original: thong pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
analyzed: thong pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
translated: She has a garland of heads for a crown

original: g-yas brkyang gdan la yang dag bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang gdan la yang dag bzhugs //
translated: and stands on a seat with her right leg extended.

original: lha rnams thams cad go rims bzhin //
analyzed: lha rnams thams cad go rims bzhin //
translated: All the deities are meditated on

original: yi ge drug las byung ba bsgom //
analyzed: yi ge drug las byung ba bsgom //
translated: in their respective places, arising from the six syllables.

original: l'am m'am p'am t'am kham zhes pas //
analyzed: l'am m'am p'am t'am kham zhes pas //
translated: With lāṃ māṃ pāṃ tāṃ khāṃ,

original: khams lnga po ni byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: khams lnga po ni byin gyis brlab //
translated: the five elements are consecrated.

original: aom a'am hri ho h'um hr'i zhes //
analyzed: aom a'am hri ho h'um hr'i zhes //
translated: With oṃ āṃ hrīḥ hoḥ hūṃ hraiḥ,

original: gzugs sogs phung po la yang ngo /
analyzed: gzugs sogs phung po la yang ngo /
translated: [the aggregates of] form and so forth are consecrated.

original: bhr'um h'um kha a'a ho ham gis //
analyzed: bhr'um h'um kha a'a ho ham gis //
translated: With bhrūṃ hūṃ khaṃ āḥ hoḥ haṃ,

original: skye mched rnams ni sbyang bar bya //🔽aom ha na ma hi /
analyzed: skye mched rnams ni sbyang bar bya // aom ha na ma hi /
translated: the sense bases are purified.🔽With oṃ haṃ haṃ,

original: sv'a h'a hu /
analyzed: sv'a h'a hu /
translated: svāhā huṃ,

original: boo shata he /
analyzed: boo shata he /
translated: vauṣaṭ he,

original: h'um h'um ho /
analyzed: h'um h'um ho /
translated: hūṃ hūṃ hoh,

original: phat ham / brang mgo spyi gtsug phrag pa dang // mig la sogs par spyar bar bya //
analyzed: phat ham / brang mgo spyi gtsug phrag pa dang // mig la sogs par spyar bar bya //
translated: Apply to the chest, crown, shoulders, eyes, and so forth.

original: aom bam ham yom hrim mom hre hrim h'um h'um phat phat /
analyzed: aom bam ham yom hrim mom hre hrim h'um h'um phat phat /
translated: Oṃ vaṃ haṃ yoṃ hriṃ moṃ hreṃ hriṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ.🔽Apply to the navel, heart, mouth,

original: lte ba snyid ga kha dang ni //🔽spyi bo spyi gtsug gzhan la dgod //
analyzed: lte ba snyid ga kha dang ni // spyi bo spyi gtsug gzhan la dgod //
translated: crown, and crown of the head.

original: lus dang ngag lam sems la ni //
analyzed: lus dang ngag lam sems la ni //
translated: To the body, speech, and mind

original: aom a'a: h'um ni dgod par bya //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um ni dgod par bya //
translated: apply oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: 'khor los sgyur drug 'khor lor gnas //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur drug 'khor lor gnas //
translated: The six wheels of the cakravartin are in the wheels,

original: lha mo'i tshogs kyi lag gnas pa'i //
analyzed: lha mo'i tshogs kyi lag gnas pa'i //
translated: held in the hands of the host of goddesses,

original: bdud rtsi lnga yi khu bas gang //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga yi khu bas gang //
translated: filled with the juice of the five elixirs.

original: thod pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bya //
analyzed: thod pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bya //
translated: Consecrate with the skull cups.

original: mchod dang bstod dad bdud rtsi myang ;
analyzed: mchod dang bstod dad bdud rtsi myang ;
translated: Make offerings, praise, and taste the elixir.

original: / byas par gyur pas spyad par bya //
analyzed: / byas par gyur pas spyad par bya //
translated: Having done that, one should practice.

original: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
translated: With a fearless mind,

original: gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa bzlas //
analyzed: gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa bzlas //
translated: recite the seven-syllable mantra.

original: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat //
analyzed: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat //
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: bsam gtan bzlas pa gang tshe skyo //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzlas pa gang tshe skyo //
translated: When one is tired of the recitation of concentration,

original: de tshe dag pa rjes dran bya //
analyzed: de tshe dag pa rjes dran bya //
translated: then recall the pure [fields].

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dpal he ru ka'o //
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dpal he ru ka'o //
translated: The branch of enlightenment that is right mindfulness is Śrī Heruka.

original: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni khrag 'thung ma'o //
analyzed: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni khrag 'thung ma'o //
translated: The branch of enlightenment that is the analysis of phenomena is Herukī.

original: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o //
translated: The branch of enlightenment that is right effort is Vajra-Bhairavī.

original: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rab gtum ma'o //🔽shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje snang byed ma'o //
analyzed: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rab gtum ma'o // shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje snang byed ma'o //
translated: The branch of enlightenment that is right joy is Pracaṇḍā.🔽The branch of enlightenment that is right pliancy is Vajraprabhā.

original: ting de 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o //
analyzed: ting de 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o //
translated: The branch of enlightenment that is right samādhi is Vajra-Cchanda.

original: mgur chu gdu bu rin chen dang // rna cha gdub kor tshangs skung de //
analyzed: mgur chu gdu bu rin chen dang // rna cha gdub kor tshangs skung de //
translated: The necklace, the bracelets, the jewels, the earrings, and the diadem,

original: de dag pha rol phyin pa drug / phyag rgya'i gzugs su sbyar ba yin //
analyzed: de dag pha rol phyin pa drug / phyag rgya'i gzugs su sbyar ba yin //
translated: these are the six perfections, applied in the form of the seals.

original: yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rgyal dka' zla bas btus pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rgyal dka' zla bas btus pa rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of the seven-syllable [mantra] compiled by the master Durjayacandra is complete.
